paragraph1: I'm Jules, a freelance web developer based in France, passionate about web development and web design for the past 5 years. I've been constantly learning and practicing, and I specialize in designing and creating full functioning websites using cutting-edge technologies and frameworks like React.js, Vite.js, or Next.js with Typescript.
paragraph2: Apart from coding. I find solace in playing video games and diving into mangas/webtoons. My love for music accompanies me throughout the day, whether I'm at the gym, working, or even sleeping (although I don't recommend the latter).
paragraph3: I'm currently looking for a full-time position as a Frontend Developer or as a Fullstack Developer. If you have a project in mind or want to discuss how we can collaborate,
payzura: First team project : A web3 Paypal like - an open-source decentralized escrow smart contract system - Made with Next.js and Tailwindcss.
kiabi: Integration and development of the interface for the new tablet directly installed in Kiabi stores - Made with Next.js and Tailwindcss.
felix: Integration and development of the international platform: Felix - using Next.js and TailwindCSS
jobzura: Second team project : A web3 native jobs marketplace Fiverr-like - Made with Next.js and Tailwindcss.
cyc: First client project : A crypto website made with Next.js and Tailwindcss.
aesfa: Second client project : A website for an association made with Next.js, Tailwindcss and MongoDB.
skoonova: Third client project : An E-sport coaching platform made with Next.js, Tailwindcss/Chakraui, Stripe and Firebase.
moonroll: Fourth client project : A web3 betting platform with games like slots, roulette, and blackjack - Made with Next.js and Tailwindcss.
twitterclone: First project to learn how to recreate Twitter's homepage with Next.js and Firebase
linkedinclone: Second project to learn how to recreate Linkedin's homepage with Next.js and MongoDB.
promptify: Promptify is an open-source AI prompting tool for modern world to discover, create and share creative prompts.
unolingo: A project to learn how to build a language learning app like Duolingo made with Next.js 14, Bun, Drizzle, Neon, Stripe, TailwindCSS.
fuzzie: A project to learn how to build a SAAS automation builder made with Next.js 14, Bun, Clerk, Neon, Stripe, Tailwind, Shadcn.
prismic: A project to learn how to build a landing page with beautiful animations made with Prismic CMS, Next.js 14, GSAP, TailwindCSS.
filedrive: A project to learn how to build a file storage app with role base authorization made with Next.js 14, Convex, TailwindCSS, Shadcn.
messengerclone: A messenger clone built with the latest Next.js 13.4 version, Prisma, MongoDB and Pusher for live messages.
ecommerceclone: A project to learn how to recreate an ecommerce store which implements Stripe as a payment functionality.
teslaclone: First React Native project to learn how to recreate a basic homepage of a Tesla app
nftapp: Second React Native project to learn how to recreate a NFT app with a modern design
aivideoshare: Third React Native project to learn how to recreate a video sharing app with a modern design
